org.opendaylight.controller.networkconfig.neutron

Interface INeutronFirewallPolicyAware


  • public interface INeutronFirewallPolicyAware
    This interface defines the methods a service that wishes to be aware of Firewall Policys needs to implement

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int canCreateNeutronFirewallPolicy(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified firewallPolicy can be created
      int canDeleteNeutronFirewallPolicy(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified firewallPolicy can be deleted
      int canUpdateNeutronFirewallPolicy(NeutronFirewallPolicy delta, NeutronFirewallPolicy original)
      Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified firewallPolicy can be changed using the specified delta
      void neutronFirewallPolicyCreated(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a firewallPolicy has been created
      void neutronFirewallPolicyDeleted(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a firewallPolicy has been deleted
      void neutronFirewallPolicyUpdated(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
      Services provide this interface method for taking action after a firewallPolicy has been updated

    • Method Detail

      • canCreateNeutronFirewallPolicy

        int canCreateNeutronFirewallPolicy(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified firewallPolicy can be created
        Parameters:
        firewallPolicy - instance of proposed new Firewall Policy object
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the create operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronFirewallPolicyCreated

        void neutronFirewallPolicyCreated(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a firewallPolicy has been created
        Parameters:
        firewallPolicy - instance of new Firewall Policy object

      • canUpdateNeutronFirewallPolicy

        int canUpdateNeutronFirewallPolicy(NeutronFirewallPolicy delta,
                                 NeutronFirewallPolicy original)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified firewallPolicy can be changed using the specified delta
        Parameters:
        delta - updates to the firewallPolicy object using patch semantics
        original - instance of the Firewall Policy object to be updated
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the update operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronFirewallPolicyUpdated

        void neutronFirewallPolicyUpdated(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a firewallPolicy has been updated
        Parameters:
        firewallPolicy - instance of modified Firewall Policy object

      • canDeleteNeutronFirewallPolicy

        int canDeleteNeutronFirewallPolicy(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
        Services provide this interface method to indicate if the specified firewallPolicy can be deleted
        Parameters:
        firewallPolicy - instance of the Firewall Policy object to be deleted
        Returns:
        integer the return value is understood to be a HTTP status code. A return value outside of 200 through 299 results in the delete operation being interrupted and the returned status value reflected in the HTTP response.

      • neutronFirewallPolicyDeleted

        void neutronFirewallPolicyDeleted(NeutronFirewallPolicy firewallPolicy)
        Services provide this interface method for taking action after a firewallPolicy has been deleted
        Parameters:
        firewallPolicy - instance of deleted Firewall Policy object
